trans-unit.source: Use Logic App templates
trans-unit.target: Use Logic App templates

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use pre-created Logic App templates to help you get started.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use pre-created Logic App templates to help you get started.

trans-unit.source: Use Logic App templates
trans-unit.target: Use Logic App templates

trans-unit.source: Logic App Templates are a set of curated pre-built Logic Apps to help you quickly get started building your own integration application.
trans-unit.target: Logic App Templates are a set of curated pre-built Logic Apps to help you quickly get started building your own integration application.

trans-unit.source: These templates show how to use some of the many connectors available in the marketplace as well as being a good way to discover various patterns that can be built using Logic Apps.
trans-unit.target: These templates show how to use some of the many connectors available in the marketplace as well as being a good way to discover various patterns that can be built using Logic Apps.

trans-unit.source: You can either use these as is or modify and them to fit your scenario.
trans-unit.target: You can either use these as is or modify and them to fit your scenario.

trans-unit.source: To get started using a Logic App Template go to the Marketplace and select Logic Apps.
trans-unit.target: To get started using a Logic App Template go to the Marketplace and select Logic Apps.

trans-unit.source: Choose one of the Logic App Templates from the curated list.
trans-unit.target: Choose one of the Logic App Templates from the curated list.

trans-unit.source: SaaS and Cloud Templates
trans-unit.target: SaaS and Cloud Templates

trans-unit.source: Examples of how to integrate across different SaaS connectors.
trans-unit.target: Examples of how to integrate across different SaaS connectors.

trans-unit.source: Here you can find various examples integrating Salesforce, Box, SharePoint and other services.
trans-unit.target: Here you can find various examples integrating Salesforce, Box, SharePoint and other services.

trans-unit.source: BizTalk Templates
trans-unit.target: BizTalk Templates

trans-unit.source: Configurations of BizTalk VETR (validate, extract, transform, route) pipelines as well as EDIFACT, X12 and AS2 message handling.
trans-unit.target: Configurations of BizTalk VETR (validate, extract, transform, route) pipelines as well as EDIFACT, X12 and AS2 message handling.

trans-unit.source: Message Routing Templates
trans-unit.target: Message Routing Templates

trans-unit.source: Patterns for doing messaging routing including synchronous request-response, routing messages across different protocols and content based routing.
trans-unit.target: Patterns for doing messaging routing including synchronous request-response, routing messages across different protocols and content based routing.

trans-unit.source: DevOps Templates
trans-unit.target: DevOps Templates

trans-unit.source: Automated processes for handling common Azure procedures that you may typically run manually or had to write custom code for.
trans-unit.target: Automated processes for handling common Azure procedures that you may typically run manually or had to write custom code for.

trans-unit.source: There are templates that cover how to do recurring processes such as restarting a VMs every weekend or getting notified when a new RBAC user has been added to a resource.
trans-unit.target: There are templates that cover how to do recurring processes such as restarting a VMs every weekend or getting notified when a new RBAC user has been added to a resource.

trans-unit.source: Consumer Cloud Templates
trans-unit.target: Consumer Cloud Templates

trans-unit.source: Simple templates that integrate with social media services such as Twitter, Yammer and email.
trans-unit.target: Simple templates that integrate with social media services such as Twitter, Yammer and email.

trans-unit.source: These can be great personal productivity applications that constantly listen for updates and takes action when new items arrive.
trans-unit.target: These can be great personal productivity applications that constantly listen for updates and takes action when new items arrive.

trans-unit.source: After selecting one of the templates complete the deployment as you would if you created your own logic app.
trans-unit.target: After selecting one of the templates complete the deployment as you would if you created your own logic app.

trans-unit.source: Please see [Create a Logic App](app-service-logic-create-a-logic-app.md).
trans-unit.target: Please see [Create a Logic App](app-service-logic-create-a-logic-app.md).

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
